head_office_address: European Association of Poisons Centres and Clinical Toxicologists c/o General Secretary Davide Lonati Rue Bryn 4
eu_initiatives:
The EAPCCT has 246 members from 43 countries in all continents. It organizes an annual international congress. 
 
The official Journal of the EAPCCT is Clinical Toxicology which is published by Taylor & Francis and appears with ten issues per year.
organisation_name: European Association of Poisons Centres and Clinical Toxicologists (EAPCCT)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Working Group on Cosmetic Products#E01302#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1302#Member#C#WG COS - CPNP maintenance group meeting
relevant_communication: Stakeholder organisation for European Poisons Centres as mentioned in Art 45 of CLP Regulation (EC 1272/2008).
legal_status: association according the article III of the legislation of June 27, 1921 of Belgium
goals__remit: Advancing knowledge and understanding of the diagnosis and treatment of all forms of poisoning.
